author: perezhilton
title: Chelsea Handler Receives Backlash For Saying Melania Trump 'Can Barely Speak English'! WATCH HERE!
text:
Chelsea Handler is not one to bite her tongue!
Over the weekend, the talk show host did an interview with Variety at the Sundance Film Festival where she was asked if she would ever interview Donald or Melania Trump .
Not surprisingly, she said no to both. However, when asked about the First Lady, she made a comment that many felt was "immigrant-shaming."
Related: Chelsea Handler Talks Getting 'Sh*t Faced' With Florence Henderson 
The former Chelsea Lately star said:
"She can barely speak English." 
Almost immediately, the Internet SLAMMED Handler for her "classless" remarks. As seen on Twitter : 
Hey @chelseahandler Melania Trump is actually fluent in French, Italian, German, Slovene and English. Chelsea Handler is fluent in "STUPID"
‚Äî Immigrants‚òÜ4‚òÜTrump (@immigrant4trump) January 24, 2017 

Uhmmm other than being classless, @chelseahandler is defiantly harassing our #FirstLady @POTUS @SecretService #tuckercarlson @TuckerCarlson https://t.co/fggpWiUdJO 
American Honey üêù (@lgmaterna) January 25, 2017 

@chelseahandler Melania is much more well spoken than you will ever be and she has class which you will never have.
‚Äî deena orourke (@ddeen1015) January 25, 2017 

@chelseahandler @MELANIATRUMP Chelsea, why are you still here? You were one of the big mouths that said you would leave if he is Pres. Bye!
‚Äî Michael Whaley (@mwhaley0223) January 25, 2017 
To judge for yourself, ch-ch-check out the clip (below)!
